column3: Name of study/ies patient enrolled in
column4: Name of a RESEARCH STUDY an INDIVIDUAL is enrolled in
column10: Has not been done here up to now. BCDE n/a

column4: Date individual was enrolled in RESEARCH STUDY
column10: Unknown presume not done here. BCDE n/a

column4: Any CONDTIONs that limit participation in RESEARCH STUDY
column10: No data standard set in the unit. Consent forms kept as per GCP for trials. Recorded on proton and individual trial/project website or database on the trust server. Answer can be 1, 2 and 3

column4: Date individual withdrew from RESEARCH STUDY
column10: Also recorded on proton and individual trial/project database on the trust server

column4: Any CONDTIONs attached to withdrawal from RESEARCH STUDY
column10: Recorded on problem page on proton. Label on front of note/flowchart, medical notes on paper, trial website and project database on trust server

column4: Identifier used for INDIVIDUAL in RESEARCH STUDY
column10: Usually same as consent. Need provision for randomisation date as well.. Recorded on trial website, on proton problems and on trial/ project database on trust server

column4: Identifier used for RESEARCH SAMPLE taken from INDIVIDUAL as part of RESEARCH STUDY
column10: Written in medical notes. Maybe on proton or email from consultant

column4: Type of RESEARCH SAMPLE
column10: Written in notes, on proton, Recorded on individual  trial website or database on trust server

column4: Date and time RESEARCH SAMPLE was given
column10: Don't understand the question. Pts do not need to give a reason for withdrawal but is documented if know on proton.

column4: Current status of RESEARCH SAMPLE
column10: Could be standardised for Oxford led studies but not for externally coordinated or commercial studies. Usually Initials and number as in protocol

column4: Quality of RESEARCH SAMPLE
column10: Central labs can have own identifiers and labels and request forms- usually paper. I record date +/- time of sampling on database. Lab will allocate more numbers after centrifuging.A=1,2&3

column4: Identifier of RESEARCH ALIQUOT made from RESEARCH SAMPLE
column10: ie Whole Blood, Serum, Plasma, Urine, Biopsy etc . Biopsy recorded on database for trial and website. BART samples recorded at lab and used for various test. Ask K Wood's lab.
